title: Use uploaded selfieGirl asset as default celebration modal image (Time-Bound targets - 2026)

requirements.summary: Update the MonthlyCompletionCelebrationModal default (no user photo selected) media preview to use the provided selfieGirl image served from a static frontend asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: When the congrats modal opens and the user has not captured/uploaded an image, the displayed preview image matches the provided selfieGirl.jpg content (not the previous default image).
After the user captures or uploads a photo, that selected photo replaces the default image as it does today.
The default image is loaded from a static frontend path (not via the backend).

file_operations.description: Change the default image constant used when selectedImage is null so the media preview renders the new static asset (frontend/public/assets/generated/celebration-default-selfieGirl.dim_696x609.png) in the “Want to celebrate with a selfie?” area, while preserving existing behavior where captured/uploaded images override the default.

requirements.summary: Add the required generated default image to static assets and point DEFAULT_CELEBRATION_IMAGE to the new filename.
acceptanceCriteria: The project contains the new default image under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in imageRequirements.required.
DEFAULT_CELEBRATION_IMAGE in MonthlyCompletionCelebrationModal.tsx points to the new asset path and renders correctly in the modal.

file_operations.description: Add the new required default celebration image asset at the exact static path frontend/public/assets/generated/celebration-default-selfieGirl.dim_696x609.png.
Update DEFAULT_CELEBRATION_IMAGE to reference /assets/generated/celebration-default-selfieGirl.dim_696x609.png so the modal renders the new default image correctly when no user photo is selected.
